bottom-bordered.description: Whether there is a border at the bottom of the table, which is invalid when 'bordered' is 'true'
bottom-bordered.description_zh: 表格底部是否有边框，在 `bordered` 为 `true` 时该参数无效

bordered.description: Whether or not to display a border

single-column.description: Whether or not to set the dividing line of the row, when the parameter is 'true', the cell does not have a lower edge line
single-column.description_zh: 是否不设定行的分割线，当参数为`true`时，则单元格没有下边线

single-line.description: Whether or not to set the dividing line of the column, when the parameter value is 'true', the cell does not have a right edge
single-line.description_zh: 是否不设定列的分割线，当参数值为 `true` 时，则单元格没有右边线

striped.description: Whether or not to use zebra stripes
